messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

unable to provide feedback task hello please below issue our colleague encounters when trying our satisfaction surveys kindly log ticket for issue assign accordingly best regards customer care en sent tuesday aw task hello survey response for second then screen away additionally coming up en with kind regards senior consultant frankfurt main frankfurt main re task hello thank you very much for your lovely feedback we make gets communicated appropriate engineer assigned your ticket regarding feedback survey you received below would you please be kind provide with further information we can isolate problem you encounter address timely manner have clicked survey link provided notification where states your feedback here was redirected feedback questions regarding your ticket could apparent issue with accessing survey or display could you please be kind advise whether there error message or take print screen issue when occurs we cannot replicate moment we have information our engineers look into what causing problem resolve looking forward receiving your best regards customer care en sent tuesday task dear sirs madames would like send feedback you ticket solved well done but can fill right response survey displayed for moment than away thank you en with kind regards senior consultant frankfurt main frankfurt main reminder have we done our job well your feedback needed fellow please tell how we fared takes only seconds your feedback here ticket reference summary status description dear sirs madames please could you generate for status for using database files for explanations model planned iterative agile following path thank you kind regards resolution granted access ad dashboard good know regardless scores you give we you take moment our work we would like say thank you every feedback you give reviewed by relevant recognize best or improve you might be contacted for details case needed if you want these surveys drop note we ll make happen although we be sorry let you go how we warm regards ext ref msg

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT ticket**

I need to categorize this IT ticket. The user’s message is a bit jumbled but mainly revolves around feedback and satisfaction surveys, as well as issues with accessing survey links. It doesn’t seem to fit hardware or HR, and while “Access” relates to their inability to reach the survey, I’m also considering “Miscellaneous.” Since they specifically asked to categorize the ticket, I should output a JSON format with the chosen category.**Deciding on ticket category**

I'm trying to determine if this ticket should be categorized as "Miscellaneous" or "Access." The user’s message discusses logging an issue with a survey link and accessing feedback questions, indicating access-related problems. Considering that it mainly revolves around a software service rather than hardware, I believe "Access" fits better. So, I’ll go ahead and categorize it as "Access" and prepare the JSON output with {"category":"Access"}.**Formatting the JSON response**

I need to format my response correctly since the tool expects a JSON object with a category field. The prompt specifically says to "Categorize this IT Ticket," followed by a list of allowed categories. I’ll ensure to output exactly: {"category":"Access"} with no extra text to meet the requirement. It’s clear the user wants just the category, so I won’t add any unnecessary details. I’ve decided that "Access" is the right choice, so I’ll return this final output.
